dialogs.text: What is happening. Why are there so many people over by the cliff.

choices.text: You should go over there, too.
I was just heading over there.

dialogs.text: I mean, I don't know. There's someone over by the bridge. ... Why is someone still over by the bridge.
You too?! I mean, of course, me as well. Off I go. Where everyone else is. Like a normal person yup uh huh.
